TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_John_Block, title = John_Block, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Block} }

S.FORM: John Block sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1944, ryax sa tay 16 nqu tay 4, John Block, squliq na p'unro.
